title: Bronze 5 vs Plat 5 LUL
body: PLayed game in norm where enemy irelaia was plat 5 and our mumu was bronze 5. k lol. gg riot matchmaking xD

replies.body: How do people still not understand normal and ranked MMR are completely seperate.........

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=LqVPcNf7,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-28T02:49:41.367+0000)
>
> How do people still not understand normal and ranked MMR are completely seperate.........

I'm just stating the amusement of having that big of a difference between 2 players in a game.

Funny how you say the amumu was bronze V but he did the best on the team.
also, bud, playing full ap malphite support and building no sightstone is off meta. watch out (☉ ͜ʖ☉) or youll end up like singed in the sin bin.

Quite likely, if the mumu is doing that well, he is a smurf, and tagged as one.  I also know a couple of people who's normal MMR is trash compared to their ranked, as they got that rank as an OTP, and of the main, they can be awful.
